nodes.text: Thank you sir. Welcome to Ganymede.
nodes.speaker: guard

nodes.text: You need an Ident Card to enter Ganymede.
nodes.speaker: guard

responses.text: Where can I get an Ident card?

nodes.text:
You should have been issued one where ever you live.
Check with security down the hall they can help.

responses.text: Why do I need an Ident card.

nodes.text:
Everyone one in Ganymede needs an ident card.
It's used to pay for goods, and provides access to secure areas.

Looking to make some money?
I need some help getting these boxes back to my shop. I'll pay you for your time.

responses.text: Yeah I could use the money.

nodes.text: Good. Do you have an Ident card?

No problem. Follow me, I know a guy in Ganymede Security who can you one, but just remember you're gonna owe me another favor after this.
|
Come on. Let's go.
Ok. Well come back and find me if you change your mind.
